sentences.sContent: The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.
sentences.sCn: 影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。

sentences.sContent: This Courtly Poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.sContent_eng: This Courtly Poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.sCn: 这首宫廷诗取材于骑士精神和典雅爱恋，你可能会想到这与身穿闪光的盔甲的骑士有关。

words.tran: 武装的；有扶手的；有防卫器官的（指动物）
